Posts.Content: Nov 9, 2017 05:01AM yoshicat wrote: Would a third opinion of a medical professional make you feel better? If so then seek this. However you have pain, and it sounds like they are not treating that. You may or may not have a breast issues, but it sounds like you do have some issue causing pain. That would be good to pursue as well. You are your best advocate in getting good medical care, unfortunately. Let these pain concerns be known, even if it is not a breast related issue it should be investigated.
Posts.Title: Venting...Back at it again MrsMurph MrsMurph
